settings.message_tracker_html.generate_b: Generate HTML template based on current Prompt Maker fields
settings.message_tracker_html.generate_h: Click to auto-generate template from your Prompt Maker fields
settings.message_tracker_html.help:
Define the HTML for the tracker preview displayed with each message. Use macros like:
{{key.subkey}}, {{#join "delimiter" arrayKey}}, {{#foreach objectOrArrayKey itemName}}...{{itemName.subKey}}...{{/foreach}}, {{#if key.subkey}}...{{/if}}.
settings.message_tracker_html.label: ğŸŒ Message Tracker HTML
settings.message_tracker_script.generate: Generate JavaScript for gender-specific field hiding based on current Prompt Maker fields
Click to auto-generate JavaScript with gender-specific field hiding
settings.message_tracker_script.help: Define any custom javascript to be used in the tracker preview. The javascript should return an object with all the functions that can be accessed through SillyTavern.trackerEnhanced
settings.message_tracker_script.label: âœ¨â€Œ Message Tracker JavaScript
settings.minimum_depth.help: Specify the minimum depth for a tracker to be injected at.
settings.minimum_depth.label: ğŸ“ Minimum Depth
settings.number_of_messages.help: Set how many recent messages are included in tracker generation prompts.
settings.number_of_messages.label: ğŸ’¬ Number of Recent Messages to Include
settings.participant_guidance.help: Customize the guidance snippet inserted into prompts. Use {{participants}} to reference the enforced names.
settings.participant_guidance.label: ğŸ§­ Participant Guidance
settings.participant_target.help: Guides seeding and prompt guidance. Choose whose perspectives the tracker should always maintain.
settings.participant_target.label: ğŸ‘¥ Participant Focus
settings.presets.button.delete.title: Delete current preset
settings.presets.button.new.title: Save preset as
settings.presets.button.rename.title: Rename current preset
settings.presets.button.restore.title: Restore current preset
settings.presets.button.save.title: Update current preset
settings.presets.export.button.title: Export current tracker enhanced preset
settings.presets.import.button.title: Import tracker enhanced preset
settings.presets.import.input.title: Import tracker enhanced preset file
settings.presets.import.error.invalidPay: Preset file must contain an object map.
settings.presets.label: Presets
settings.presets.prompt.new: Enter a name for the new preset:
settings.presets.prompt.rename: Enter the new name for the preset:
settings.presets.error.builtinReserved: Built-in preset names are reserved. Choose a unique name for your custom preset.
settings.presets.error.duplicateName: A preset with that name already exists.
settings.presets.error.renameReserved: Built-in preset names are reserved. Choose a different name.
settings.presets.confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete the preset "{{name}}"?
settings.presets.success.savedFromOrigin: Tracker Enhanced preset "{{name}}" created from "{{original}}" and saved.
settings.presets.toast.title: Tracker Enhanced Presets
settings.presets.toast.duplicated: Built-in preset duplicated to {{name}}. Future edits apply to this copy.
settings.presets.toast.legacyReadOnly: This preset uses an older schema. Previewing it in read-only mode instead.
settings.presets.viewer.title: Legacy Preset (Read Only)
settings.presets.viewer.description: This preset uses an older schema and cannot be applied. Preview the saved values below.
settings.presets.viewer.reasons.title: Compatibility reasons
settings.presets.legacy.link.tooltip: View quarantined presets. Entries are read-only and can only be exported or deleted.
settings.presets.legacy.modal.title: Legacy Preset Archive
settings.presets.legacy.modal.subtitle: These presets were quarantined by schema checks. Inspect or export them from here; they stay read-only and cannot be applied.
settings.presets.legacy.toast.title: Legacy Presets
settings.presets.legacy.empty: No legacy presets are stored right now.
settings.presets.legacy.delete.confirm: Remove legacy preset "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
settings.presets.legacy.reasons.title: Compatibility reasons
settings.presets.legacy.toast.tracker_re: Active tracker definition reset to the canonical default.
settings.presets.legacy.reason.invalid_t: Tracker definition is incompatible with the latest schema.
settings.presets.legacy.reason.invalid_f: A tracker field has an invalid structure.
settings.presets.legacy.reason.missing_f: A field is missing its canonical identifier.
settings.presets.legacy.reason.mismatche: A field identifier does not match the canonical schema.
settings.presets.legacy.reason.missing_f: A field is missing its display label.
settings.presets.legacy.reason.metadata_: Field metadata conflicts with the canonical schema.
settings.presets.export.error.failed: Failed to export preset. Check console for details.
settings.prompt_maker.help: This is where the tracker fields, default values, and example values are defined.
settings.recent_messages.help:
Template for recent messages in the tracker. Macros include:
{{char}}, {{message}}, {{tracker}}, {{#if tracker}}...{{/if}}.
settings.recent_messages.label: âŒ› Recent Messages Template
settings.request.help:
Set the request prompt for generating the tracker. Available macros include:
{{trackerFieldPrompt}}, {{trackerFormat}}, {{message}} (last message).
settings.request.label: á¯“â¤ Request Prompt
settings.reset.error: Failed to reset settings. Check console for details.
settings.reset.success: Defaults restored. Custom presets and backups were preserved.
settings.response_length.help: Set a response token limit for tracker prompts. Leave blank or set to 0 to use the default response token limit.
settings.response_length.label: ğŸ“ Response Length
settings.roleplay.help: Additional guidance inserted ahead of the tracker block when we inject into SillyTavern prompts. Keep it concise and focused on diegetic knowledge boundaries.
settings.roleplay.label: ğŸ¬ Roleplay Injection Prompt
settings.show_popup_for.help: Choose which speakers should open the manual tracker editor when automation is active. Options depend on the automation target.
settings.show_popup_for.label: ğŸªŸ Show Popup For
settings.system.help:
Define the system-level prompt for tracker generation. Use macros like:
{{charNames}}, {{defaultTracker}}, {{trackerFormat}}.
settings.system.label: ğŸ“œ System Prompt
settings.title: Tracker Enhanced
settings.toolbar_indicator.label: Show toolbar injection indicator
trackerPromptMaker.messages.confirmRemov: Are you sure you want to remove this field?
trackerPromptMaker.title: Tracker Prompt Maker
